title: Nemurenu Kishi ni Hanataba wo
sinopse:
In the kingdom of Diezerick, there is a legend about a knight who defended the whole country and its king from an evil witch. Many years later, a novice knight, Alec, joins the Royal Palace Knights and meets the legendary knight but he's far from what she expected...
Other stories:

-   Billy Bocchan no Yuuutsu

-   My Little Lily

-   Over the Blue

-   Touzoku Zeal wa Dare ga Tame ni Mau
